data.message: God is real and so is satan. God sent his son Jesus to die for our sins. Jesus died and rose in 3 days so that we can repent of our sin. If we do not repent then hell after death will be our new home. Please repent!! Satan is here to steal, kill, and destroy. There's a spiritual battle going on for our souls. Please repent. Ask God for forgiveness of your sins. Accept Jesus as your Lord and savior. Live righteous. Let the word of God be your weapon. Hell is real and many are going to that place. The road to Heaven is narrow. Repent please 🙏🙏🙏 The end is near.... Just sharing the Gospel..
